General.Name: TAG Oil Ltd.
General.Description: TAG Oil Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration, development, and production of oil and gas in Canada, the Middle East, and North Africa. The company was formerly known as Durum Cons. Energy Corp. and changed its name to TAG Oil Ltd. in June 2002. TAG Oil Ltd. was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1050 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 3S7
